Buttons

Primary button Secondary button Dark button Clear button Success button Error button Invert button Cancel button Ghost button External button Ghost invert button Large button Medium button Small button Extra small button Close button Pill button Extra small button

Usage notes

We have 3 action levels in our buttons, Default, Primary and Link. Default and Primary and will always visually appear as buttons, whilst the Link button is a ‘text link’. For completeness an example of a button used for alerts is also shown.
